remarks: The value of the rank function expressed recursively: the rank of a set is the smallest ordinal number containing the ranks of all members of the set.  Proposition 9.17 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jun-2013.)
